reviewText: So informative and easy to understand.  This DVD at one point does state the assumption that the knitter is already familiar with 2 color knitting techniques.

This video (which contains the pattern in the insert) is absolutely essential if you are ready to begin tackling a true Fair Isle piece.  Meg explains the ins and outs of both fair isle design and stranded knitting.

She also delves into a bit of design in the video but it is not the focus of the DVD.
